page.title: 14LIFE STYLES:LORNA AGE 14
page.content: At{7.15am}the alarm goes off and Lorna gets washed and dressed.She has a breakfast of cereal with toast and acup of tea.She leaves home at{8.15}to go to{school}for an{8.55}start.Her first two lessons are English and geography.During a short break she has a packet of crisps in the cloakroom. Her next lesson is maths and then her lunch of chips,coke and an apple in the cafeteria. In the afternoon she has physical education and chemistry. School finishes at{3.45. She changes out of her school uniform to do her newspaper round.At{5.15}she has her evening meal of stew followed by rice pudding.In the early evening she helps wash the dishes,tidies her room and then does her school homework.Before going to bed at{10.30 she watches television after her supper of a hot drink and biscuits.
